mapper.select: SELECT oftd.template_detail_id, oftd.region_id, rg.region_name , oftd.transport_type_code, oftd.first_piece_weight, oftd.first_price, oftd.next_piece_weight, oftd.next_price, oftd.default_flag, oftd.template_id, oftd.object_version_number, oftd.creation_date, oftd.created_by, oftd.last_updated_by, oftd.last_update_date FROM o2md_freight_template_detail oftd left join hpfm_region rg on oftd.region_id = rg.region_id and rg.tenant_id = #{tenantId} left join hpfm_region_tl rgtl on rg.region_id = rgtl.region_id and rgtl.lang = #{lang} WHERE oftd.default_flag =1 and oftd.template_id= #{templateId} and oftd.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
